children.name: removeStop

parameters.name: stop `kendo.drawing.GradientStop`
parameters.description: The gradient color stop to remove.

children.description: Removes a color stop from the gradient.Inherited from [Gradient.removeStop](gradient#methods-removeStop)

children.name: start

parameters.name: start `Array|kendo.geometry.Point`
parameters.description: The start point of the gradient.Coordinates are relative to the shape bounding box.For example [0, 0] is top left and [1, 1] is bottom right.

children.description: Gets or sets the start point of the gradient.

children.name: end

parameters.name: end `Array|kendo.geometry.Point`
parameters.description: The end point of the gradient.Coordinates are relative to the shape bounding box.For example [0, 0] is top left and [1, 1] is bottom right.

children.description: Gets or sets the end point of the gradient.

children.name: addStop
children.description: Adds a color stop to the gradient.Inherited from [Gradient.addStop](gradient#methods-addStop)

children.name: stops
children.description: The color stops of the gradient.Can contain either plain objects or [GradientStop](gradient-stop) instances.
